mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE POST_CODE = #{post_code} ORDER BY R_CREATION_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_CODE, REPLY_CONTENT, R_CREATION_DATE, MEMBER_ID, POST_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE ) VALUES ( #{reply_code}, #{reply_content}, #{r_creation_date}, #{member_id}, #{post_code}, #{product_code} )
mapper.select: select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+)

select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+) and reply.post_code != 'null'

select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+) and reply.payment_code != 'null'

select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+) and reply.member_id = #{member_id}

select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+) and reply.member_id = #{member_id} and reply.post_code != 'null'

select * from reply, payment, post, board, demand where reply.post_code = post.post_code(+) and post.board_code = board.board_code(+) and reply.payment_code = payment.payment_code(+) and payment.demand_code = demand.demand_code(+) and reply.member_id = #{member_id} and reply.payment_code != 'null'

select r.reply_code,r.reply_content,r.r_creation_date,r.member_id,p.star_score from reply r,demand d, payment p where r.payment_code = p.payment_code and p.demand_code = d.demand_code and d.product_code = #{product_code} order by r.r_creation_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from reply where payment_code in( select payment_code from payment p, demand d where p.demand_code = d.demand_code and d.product_code = #{product_code})
mapper.select: select rownum, r.reply_code, r.reply_content, to_char(r.r_creation_date,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as r_creation_date, p.post_title, b.board_name from (select * from reply where member_id=#{member_id} and post_code is not null order by r_creation_date desc) r, post p, board b where rownum <= 5 and p.board_code=b.board_code and r.post_code=p.post_code

select t.tender_code, t.member_id, b.company_code, p.star_score,r.reply_content, to_char(r.r_creation_date,'yyyy.MM.dd hh:mi:ss') r_creation_date from tender t, bid b, payment p, reply r where t.tender_code=b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether='y' and t.tender_code=p.tender_code and b.company_code=#{company_code} and p.payment_code=r.payment_code order by r_creation_date desc

select count(*) from(select t.tender_code, t.member_id, b.company_code, c.company_name, p.star_score,r.reply_content, to_char(r.r_creation_date,'yyyy.MM.dd hh:mi:ss') r_creation_date from tender t, bid b, payment p, reply r, company_info c where t.tender_code=b.tender_code and b.win_bid_whether='y' and t.tender_code=p.tender_code and b.company_code=#{company_code} and p.payment_code=r.payment_code and b.company_code=c.company_code order by r_creation_date) o
